game.action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.action.Action

  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Action commanded by a duke, from a source castle to a target. An army of entities takes a route, then attack or join the target castle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Action(Castle source, Castle target, Army army)
      Construct an action depending on the source castle, the target and the army.

    • Method Summary

      Give the position where an entity will be at the next turn, depending on his current position and his speed.

      Getter on source.
      Castle getTarget()
      Getter on target.
      void launch()
      Launch a number of entities from the army (depending on the size of the source castle's door) on the route.
      void nextTurn()
      If action is launching: launches new entities of the army on the route.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Write a message that contains all information of the action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action(Castle source,
              Castle target,
              Army army)
        Construct an action depending on the source castle, the target and the army.
        Parameters:
        source - Source castle where army come from.
        target - Target castle where army will go.
        army - Army involved in the action.

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public void launch()
        Launch a number of entities from the army (depending on the size of the source castle's door) on the route. When all entities of the army are outside the source castle, the army starts to move.

      • getNextPosition

        public Position getNextPosition(Position position,
                                int speed)
                         throws ExceptionPositionOutOfRoute
        Give the position where an entity will be at the next turn, depending on his current position and his speed.
        Parameters:
        position - Current position of the entity.
        speed - Speed of the entity.
        Returns:
        Next position of the entity on the road.
        Throws:
        ExceptionPositionOutOfRoute - Thrown if the current position of the entity is outside the route.

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        If action is launching: launches new entities of the army on the route. If action is moving: calls nextTurn() on each entities of the army to make them move. If action is attack: calls nextTurn() on each entities of the army to make them attack, and check elements on the target castle. If the castle is owned by the duke, the action finishes. If the target's stock of entities is empty, the castle is conquered. Called at each new turn.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Write a message that contains all information of the action.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Message that contains all information of the action.

      • getArmy

        public Army getArmy()
        Getter on army.
        Returns:
        Army involved in the action.

      • getCurrentState

        public ActionState getCurrentState()
        Getter on currentState.
        Returns:
        State of the action.

      • getSource

        public Castle getSource()
        Getter on source.
        Returns:
        Source castle where army come from.

      • getTarget

        public Castle getTarget()
        Getter on target.
        Returns:
        Target castle where army will go.
